attributes.action: Bring back Darley Abbey concert back to Derby, free for all!
attributes.background: DCC move the yearly free concerts from Darley park to Castle Donington....this yearly family gathering, listening to good music and enjoying fireworks at the end becomes yearly tradition  that compensates people of Derby... It brings communities together with out the hassle of paying  more!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local events are the responsibility of your local council. In this case, it seems like it is probably the responsibility of Derby County Council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You can also petition Derby County Council - you can find out more about their petitions process here:

http://www.derbyshire.gov.uk/council/have_your_say/petitions/default.asp?VD=petitions
